items.title: Brinker International Edges Higher After JPMorgan Upgrades Stock To ‘Overweight’

items.title: Trump Administration Reportedly Planning Another $12 Billion in Clean Energy Funding Cuts
items.description: The new list of clean energy projects that may be slashed follows the Trump administration's announcement of $8 billion in cuts last week.
